languages.text: {n}Вам вспоминается легенда о святой Кирине, которой было явлено знамение о затаившихся врагах. Кирина молила Императора указать изменников, и изо рта ее исторглось враново перо, которое начертало имена заговорщиков. Лишь сведущий в символах Империума мог оставить такое послание.{/n}

{n}A certain legend springs to your mind, one involving Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. When Quirine prayed to the Emperor for a sign that might reveal the traitors, a raven's feather burst out of her mouth to inscribe the names of the conspirators. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left such a message.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам вспоминается легенда о святой Кирине, которой было явлено знамение о затаившихся врагах. Кирина молила Императора указать изменников, и изо рта ее исторглось враново перо, которое начертало имена заговорщиков. Лишь сведущий в символах Империума мог оставить такое послание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A certain legend comes to your mind, one of Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. Quirine then prayed to the Emperor for a sign that would point to the traitors, and a raven feather appeared out of her mouth and wrote the names of the conspirators. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left a message such as this.{/n}

{n}A certain legend comes to your mind, one of Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left a message such as this.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous revient en mémoire une légende évoquant Sainte Quirine, célèbre pour avoir reçu un présage dénonçant la présence d'ennemis infiltrés parmi les fidèles. Quand Quirine adressa une prière à l'Empereur pour qu'il l'aide à démasquer les traîtres, une plume de corbeau aurait surgi de sa bouche avant d'écrire leurs noms sous ses yeux. Seul un individu versé dans la symbolique de l'Imperium aurait pu laisser un tel message.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A certain legend springs to your mind, one involving Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. When Quirine prayed to the Emperor for a sign that might reveal the traitors, a raven's feather burst out of her mouth to inscribe the names of the conspirators. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left such a message.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous revient en mémoire une légende évoquant Sainte Quirine, célèbre pour avoir reçu un présage dénonçant la présence d'ennemis infiltrés parmi les fidèles. Quand Quirine adressa une prière à l'Empereur pour qu'il l'aide à démasquer les traîtres, une plume de corbeau aurait surgi de sa bouche avant d'écrire leurs noms sous ses yeux. Seul un individu versé dans la symbolique de l'Imperium aurait pu laisser un tel message.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cierta leyenda llega a tu mente. Está relacionada con san Quirine, que recibió una visión en la que los enemigos se escondían entre los fieles. Cuando Quirine rogó al Emperador que le enviara una señal para identificar a los traidores, de su boca brotó la pluma de un cuervo para inscribir los nombres de los conspiradores. Solo alguien que conozca bien la simbología del Imperium podría dejar este mensaje.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A certain legend springs to your mind, one involving Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. When Quirine prayed to the Emperor for a sign that might reveal the traitors, a raven's feather burst out of her mouth to inscribe the names of the conspirators. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left such a message.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cierta leyenda llega a tu mente. Está relacionada con san Quirine, que recibió una visión en la que los enemigos se escondían entre los fieles. Cuando Quirine rogó al Emperador que le enviara una señal para identificar a los traidores, de su boca brotó la pluma de un cuervo para inscribir los nombres de los conspiradores. Solo alguien que conozca bien la simbología del Imperium podría dejar este mensaje.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的脑海中突然浮现出了某个特别的传说，关于圣奎里恩的传说。这位圣徒可以找到隐藏在虔诚之人中的敌人。每当圣奎里恩向帝皇祈祷，希望能得到揭发叛徒的预示时，她都会从嘴里喷出一根乌鸦的羽毛，上面刻着叛徒的名字。只有极其了解帝国信仰的人，才有能力留下这样的线索。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A certain legend springs to your mind, one involving Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. When Quirine prayed to the Emperor for a sign that might reveal the traitors, a raven's feather burst out of her mouth to inscribe the names of the conspirators. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left such a message.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的脑海中突然浮现出了某个特别的传说，关于圣奎里恩的传说。这位圣徒可以找到隐藏在虔诚之人中的敌人。每当圣奎里恩向帝皇祈祷，希望能得到揭发叛徒的预示时，她都会从嘴里喷出一根乌鸦的羽毛，上面刻着叛徒的名字。只有极其了解帝国信仰的人，才有能力留下这样的线索。{/n}

languages.text: {n}とある伝説を思い出した。聖キリーヌの伝説だ。信者の間に敵が潜んでいることを示すお告げを聞いたのだ。キリーヌが皇帝に祈り、裏切り者を明らかにしようとすると、彼女の口からカラスの羽が飛び出し、陰謀を企てた者たちの名前が刻まれた。このようなメッセージを残すことができたのは、帝国の象徴に精通した者だけであった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A certain legend springs to your mind, one involving Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. When Quirine prayed to the Emperor for a sign that might reveal the traitors, a raven's feather burst out of her mouth to inscribe the names of the conspirators. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left such a message.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}とある伝説を思い出した。聖キリーヌの伝説だ。信者の間に敵が潜んでいることを示すお告げを聞いたのだ。キリーヌが皇帝に祈り、裏切り者を明らかにしようとすると、彼女の口からカラスの羽が飛び出し、陰謀を企てた者たちの名前が刻まれた。このようなメッセージを残すことができたのは、帝国の象徴に精通した者だけであった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir kommt eine Legende in den Sinn, die Legende der Heiligen Quirine, der ein Trupp von Feinden geschenkt wurde, welche sich unter den Gläubigen versteckten. Als Quirine zum Imperator betete, er möge ihr ein Zeichen schicken, welches die Verräter offenbart, schoss aus ihrem Mund die Feder eines Rabens, um die Namen der Verschwörer niederzuschreiben. Nur, wer mit der Symbologie des Imperiums vertraut ist, kann eine solche Nachricht hinterlassen haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A certain legend springs to your mind, one involving Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. When Quirine prayed to the Emperor for a sign that might reveal the traitors, a raven's feather burst out of her mouth to inscribe the names of the conspirators. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left such a message.{/n}

Als Quirine zum Imperator betete, er möge ihr ein Zeichen schicken, welches die Verräter offenbart, schoss aus ihrem Mund die Feder eines Rabens, um die Namen der Verschwörer niederzuschreiben. languages.text: {n}Azize Quirine'in anlatıldığı efsane aklına geliveriyor. Efsanede Quirine'e düşmanlarının inançlıların arasında saklandığına dair bir görü bahşediliyor. Quirine, İmparator'a hainleri açığa çıkaracak bir işaret için dua ediyor. Ardından ağzından komplocuların isimlerini yazacak bir kuzgun tüyü çıkıyor. Yalnızca İmparatorluk'un sembol sistemine aşina birisi böyle bir mesaj bırakabilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A certain legend springs to your mind, one involving Saint Quirine, who was granted a portent of enemies hiding among the faithful. When Quirine prayed to the Emperor for a sign that might reveal the traitors, a raven's feather burst out of her mouth to inscribe the names of the conspirators. Only someone versed in the symbology of the Imperium could have left such a message.{/n}
